channel.title: RDIO Radio Shows
channel.description: Curated radio shows with themed music and AI-generated presentations

item.title: Japanese Fusion: East Meets West in Sound
item.description:
A sonic journey through Japan's groundbreaking fusion movement of the 1970s and early 80s, where traditional Japanese sensibilities merged with American jazz, funk, and electronic experimentation. Featuring Hiroshi Suzuki, Ryo Kawasaki, Jun Fukamachi, Haruomi Hosono, and other pioneers who created a uniquely Japanese sound that captivated the world.

Series: fusion-frontiers

Tags: fusion, jazz-rock, progressive fusion, experimental, japanese fusion, exotica, jazz fusion

Tracklist:

  1. Hiroshi Suzuki - Cat (Cat, 1976)
  2. Haruomi Hosono - Japanese Rhumba (Paraiso, 1978)
  3. Ryo Kawasaki - Bamboo Child (Juice, 1976)
  4. Jun Fukamachi - Spiral Steps (Spiral Steps, 1976)
  5. Hiromasa Suzuki - Scramble (High-Flying, 1976)
  6. 清水靖晃 - 案山子 (案山子, 1982)
item.itunes:author: RDIO

item.title: Kosmische Musik: A Journey Through Krautrock
item.description:
An exploration of Germany's revolutionary 1970s rock scene, featuring motorik rhythms, cosmic explorations, and avant-garde experimentation from the pioneers who changed music forever.

Series: Underground Sounds

Tags: krautrock, experimental, psychedelic, ambient, motorik, german rock, 1970s

Tracklist:

  1. Neu! - Hallogallo (Neu!, 1972)
  2. CAN - Vitamin C (Ege Bamyasi, 1972)
  3. Faust - The Sad Skinhead (Faust IV, 1973)
  4. Ash Ra Tempel - Look at Your Sun (Schwingungen (Ohr), 1972)
  5. Popol Vuh - Aguirre I (L'acrime di rei) (Aguirre, 1976)
  6. CLUSTER & ENO - Ho Renomo (Cluster & Eno, 1977)
item.itunes:author: RDIO

item.title: Duende - The Soul of Flamenco
item.description:
A passionate journey through flamenco music featuring legendary artists Paco de Lucia, Camaron de la Isla, Ketama, and Carlos Heredia. From traditional forms to nuevo flamenco, experience the duende - that inexplicable magic that transforms sound into pure emotion.

Series: World Music Journeys

Tags: flamenco, spanish, guitar, world music, nuevo flamenco

Tracklist:

  1. Paco de Lucia - Entre Dos Aguas (Fuente Y Caudal, 1973)
  2. Camaron de la Isla - Volando voy (La leyenda del tiempo, 1978)
  3. Paco de Lucia - Allegrias (En Vivo Desde El Teatro Real, 1975)
  4. Camaron de la Isla & Paco de Lucia - Como Castillo De Arena (Castillo de arena, 1977)
  5. Carlos Heredia - No Quiero Verte - Tangos (Gypsy Flamenco, 2004)
  6. Ketama, Toumani Diabate & Danny Thompson - Jarabi (Songhai, 1988)
  7. Ketama - Vengo de borrachera (El Arte de lo invisible, 1993)
  8. Paco de Lucia - Solea (En Vivo Desde El Teatro Real, 1975)
  9. Camaron de la Isla - Nana del caballo grande (La leyenda del tiempo, 1978)
  10. Carlos Heredia - Las tres Mil - Bulerias (Gypsy Flamenco, 2004)
  11. Ketama, Toumani Diabate & Jose Soto - Ndia (Songhai 2, 1994)
  12. Paco de Lucia - Zapateado (En Vivo Desde El Teatro Real, 1975)
  13. Camaron de la Isla - Homenaje a Federico (La leyenda del tiempo, 1978)
item.itunes:author: RDIO

item.title: Black President: The Revolutionary Sound of Fela Kuti
item.description:
A celebration of Fela Anikulapo Kuti, the Nigerian musician who invented Afrobeat and used his music as a weapon against corruption and military dictatorship. This show explores his incredible journey from London jazz student to Africa's most challenging and charismatic performer.

Series: African Legends

Tags: afrobeat, fela kuti, african music, protest music, nigerian, funk, jazz

Tracklist:

  1. Fela Kuti - Highlife Time (Koola Lobitos / The '69 L.A. Sessions, 2010)
  2. Fela Kuti - Water No Get Enemy (Expensive Shit / He Miss Road, 2010)
  3. Fela Ransome-Kuti & Afrika '70 - Zombie (Zombie (2001 Issue), 1977)
  4. Fela Kuti - Sorrow Tears And Blood (Opposite People / Sorrow Tears And Blood, 2010)
  5. Fela Kuti - Shuffering And Shmiling (Shuffering And Shmiling / No Agreement, 2010)
  6. Fela Kuti - Colonial Mentality (Opposite People / Sorrow Tears And Blood, 2010)
  7. Fela Kuti - I.T.T. (International Thief Thief) (Original Suffer Head / ITT, 2010)
  8. Fela Kuti With Ginger Baker - Ginger Baker & Tony Allen Drum Solo (Live!, 2010)
  9. Fela Kuti - Fear Not For Man (Stalemate / Fear Not For Man, 2010)
  10. Fela Kuti - Upside Down (Upside Down / Music Of Many Colours, 2010)
item.itunes:author: RDIO

item.title: Latin Jazz Corner
item.description:
The fiery rhythms of Latin jazz, blending Afro-Cuban percussion with bebop sophistication.

Series: Latin Jazz Corner

Tags: latin, jazz, afro-cuban

Tracklist:

  1. Willie Bobo - Spanish Grease (Let's Go Bobo - The Very Best Of, 1964)
  2. Tito Puente & Eddie Palmieri - Picadillo Jam (Masterpiece (Obra Maestra), 2000)

  4. Arturo Sandoval, Chick Corea, Poncho Sanchez, Pete Escovedo - A Night In Tunisia (Jam Miami - A Celebration Of Latin Jazz, 2000)
  5. Moacir Santos - Coisa n° 5 (Coisas, 1965)
  6. Sergio Mendes & Brasil '66 - Berimbau (Herb Alpert Presents Sergio Mendes & Brasil '66, 1966)
  7. Willie Bobo - Evil Ways (Let's Go Bobo - The Very Best Of, 1964)
  8. Eddie Palmieri - Bilongo (Superimposition, 1968)

item.description:
A celebration of the golden age of jazz innovation, from bebop pioneers to spiritual jazz explorers.

Series: Jazz Heritage

item.title: The Genius of Bach
item.description:
A journey through Bach's most profound keyboard works, featuring legendary performances by Glenn Gould and Rosalyn Tureck.

Series: Classical Masters

Tags: classical, baroque, piano
